relationships.description: Neville will take Harry’s place. There would still be three in the secret.
Dumbledore had died knowing that three people still knew about the Horcruxes;
Neville seized his wrist as Harry made to move on. “We’re all going to keep ﬁghting, Harry. You know that?”
